publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1016 Murdo Fraser: Black Watch Memorial—That the Parliament praises the campaign being undertaken by the Black Watch Association, in partnership with Edinburgh World Heritage, to raise £15,000 to restore the Black Watch Memorial on Edinburgh’s Mound; notes that the impressive memorial is of a kilted Black Watch soldier and commemorates the men of the Black Watch regiment who fell in the Boer War from 1899 to 1902; thanks the Bank of Scotland for donating £5,000 towards the restoration of the monument, underlining the bank’s dedication to preserving memorials to Scotland’s fallen soldiers, and recognises the importance of protecting and restoring memorials to Scottish soldiers who have served and died in all wars.

S3M-1016 Black Watch Memorial (lodged on 11 December 2007) Jamie McGrigor*, John Park*, John Lamont*, Elizabeth Smith*, Alasdair Allan*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Derek Brownlee*, Alex Johnstone*, David McLetchie*, Nanette Milne*, Kenneth Gibson*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*, Jamie Stone*, Jackson Carlaw*, Nigel Don*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-1016 Black Watch Memorial (lodged on 11 December 2007) Gil Paterson*, Mike Pringle*, Ken Macintosh*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Mary Scanlon*, Bill Aitken*, Alex Neil*
